did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Prince Edward County: list of delinquents and insolvent taxpayers for 1863, 1864, 1864

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Auditor of Public Accounts, Prince Edward County: list of delinquents and insolvent taxpayers for 1863, 1864. Accession APA 440. State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: These records are part of Auditor of Public Accounts. Administration of State Government: Revenue Assessment and Collection - Delinquent Taxes. This series consists of two lists of nonpayers of revenue taxes for the year 1863. Both lists contain the names of delinquents and the amounts of tax owed.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged alphabetically by subject of record.
